author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Caturday, October 10, 2015: "Box Clever" – Simon’s Cat | Opinion - Conservative
text:
(Before It's News)
On YouTube:
Click here to view the embedded video.
Published on Oct 1, 2015 by Simon’s Cat
‘A feisty cat does all he can to avoid a trip to the vet’
Don’t forget to SHARE + SUBSCRIBE!
http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=simonscat
‘Box Clever’ is a film that Simon has wanted to make for a long time. During the development of the film’s story, the team thought the theme of a trip to the vets could be explored beyond the usual 1 to 2 minute YouTube films we make, and saw it as the perfect opportunity to tell a longer narrative – out of which the idea for our Indiegogo crowdfunded short film ‘Off to the Vet’ was born.
‘Box Clever’ features in ‘Off to the Vet’ as just a small part of the overall story. We decided to release ‘Box Clever’ in black and white as it works as a stand alone film, and a small teaser for non funders. : )
We hope you enjoy it!
‘OFF TO THE VET’ UPDATE
‘Off to the Vet’ is the first 12 minute Simon’s Cat film produced in full colour. The film is now complete and currently only available to our Indiegogo funders via our private production blog. We plan to release ‘Off to the Vet’ in 2016, so please look out for updates on www.simonscat.com and on our YouTube channel!
Public updates relating to the campaign and project can be seen at – https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/simon-s-cat-in-off-to-the-vet#/updates
NEW BOOK OUT IN OCTOBER!
‘Off to the Vet and Other Cat-astrophes’ will be released internationally on October 29th. For more details on where to buy in your country please visit –
http://simonscat.com/blog/off-to-the-vet-and-other-cat-astrophies/
CREDITS
Directed by: Simon Tofield
Animation: Laura Nailor
Clean Up: Setareh Seto
Animation Supervisor: Isobel Stenhouse
Compositor: Daniele Baiardini
Studio Assistant: Liza Nechaeva
Theme Tune: Shrooty
Sound FX: Mcasso Music
Character Voices: Simon Tofield
Executive Producer: Mike Bell
Producer: Emma Burch
Associate Producer: Edwin Eckford
Visit our Official Website!: http://www.simonscat.com
Visit our Webshop!: http://www.simonscat.theofficialwebshop.com/index.php
Stay connected with Simon’s Cat on your favourite websites:
Facebook: http://facebook.com/simonscat
Google+: http://plus.google.com/+SimonsCat
Twitter: http://twitter.com/SimonsCat
Tumblr: http://simonscat.tumblr.com/
Pinterest: http://pinterest.com/simonscat
What software do you use?
‘Box Clever’ was animated and cleaned up using TV Paint. Elements were composited using Adobe After Effects.
Thank you for watching! : )
